overview: The 27th Dream Concert took place on June 26 at Seoul World Cup Stadium in Mapo-gu, Seoul.  The lineup for this year’s Dream Concert included AB6IX, A.C.E, aespa, CIX, ITZY, NCT DREAM, Golden Child, Kim Jae Hwan, Dreamcatcher, LABOUM, MOMOLAND, Brave Girls, ASTRO, Oh My Girl, ONF, WEi, Weki Meki, Forte di Quattro, and Ha Sung Woon.  Furthermore, rookie artists ARIAZ, PIXY, T1419, DKB, DRIPPIN, Sinchon Tiger, AleXa, Kingdom, and HOT ISSUE will join the “Dream Rising” stage to splendidly kick off 2021 Dream Concert.
title: 2021 Dream Concert
